# zeronetworks_custom_group_members (Resource)

CustomGroupMembers Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "zeronetworks_custom_group_members" "my_customgroupmembers" {
  id = "g:t:01445453"
  members_id = [
    "g:c:ab124as2",
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) groupId to filter on
- `members_id` (List of String) members id

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

In Terraform v1.5.0 and later, the [`import` block](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) can be used with the `id` attribute, for example:

```terraform
import {
  to = zeronetworks_custom_group_members.my_zeronetworks_custom_group_members
  id = "g:t:01445453"
}
```

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import zeronetworks_custom_group_members.my_zeronetworks_custom_group_members "g:t:01445453"
```
